comments.body:
Hi @mazamizo21, 
We would like to ask you to raise separate PRs for each new solution to help avoid any confusion.
Please ensure that each solution includes the data connector folder and its relevant files, as well as the data file, releasenote file, solutionmetadata file, maintemplate, createui files, and a zip file with version 3.0.0. All these files are required.
You can package the solution using the V3 tool. Here is the readme file for creating a new solution: [https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/blob/master/Tools/Create-Azure-Sentinel-Solution/V3/README.â€¦](https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/blob/master/Tools/Create-Azure-Sentinel-Solution/V3/README.md)
If you have any questions, please feel free to ask here.
Thanks!

Hi @v-shukore, thank you for the review. We have already proceeded with separating the solutions as requested.

- This PR (#13224) now contains ONLY the **Cyren Threat Intelligence** solution.
- The **TacitRed CrowdStrike IOC** solution is in PR #13226.
- The **TacitRed Threat Intelligence** solution is in PR #13227.

Please let us know if anything else is needed. Thanks!

I have now cleaned up this PR (https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/pull/13224) to contain ONLY the Cyren solution.
The TacitRed solutions were moved to https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/pull/13226 and https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/pull/13227, which you closed.
Could you please re-open https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/pull/13226 and https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/pull/13227 now that this PR is cleaned up?
Thank you!
